credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: 5-harness satin patterned by weft floats and floats of discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front by a supplementary warp in 1/3 twill
description: Long, narrow fragment with a pattern of a shell-like urn containing fruit in metallic and multi-colored silks.
name: Fragment
